flawed_nl_solution:
Mr. Mayer wants to get a $1000 x 3/10 = $<<1000*3/10=300>>300 profit.
So, he will sell each Corgi dog for $1000 + $300 = $<<1000+300=1300>>1300.
Hence, his friend should pay $1300 x 2 = $<<1300*2=26000>>26000.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2600, not 26000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
